extendedInfo.description: Capital of Maharashtra and the largest city of India, Mumbai, undoubtedly is the most popular cosmopolitan among Indians. One of the most populous cities, it is the commercial center of India and a symbolic hub of Bollywood. This metropolis is successively growing larger day-by-day. It is a melting pot of India, with people belonging to all walks of life dwelling in the city in harmony. Mumbai, the Android app, is your complete virtual travel guide to the largest city of India. Explore Mumbai like never before with detailed information available on Weather, City Map, Train, Must Visit, Nightlife, Hotels, Emergency and Lingo Help. Weather: Being in the tropical zone and near the Arabian Sea, Mumbai is home to pleasant blue skies and cool sea breeze during monsoon and winter. During summers and before monsoon the city is too humid. Thus, get latest weather updates before you step out to explore the city of dreams. (Internet connectivity is required to get current weather report.)City Map: Find places from the city map that works offline. It helps you to understand routes and directions better. Train: One of the most preferred mode to commute, Mumbai Suburban Railway is the backbone of the city's transport. Mumbai provides the route map of Western, Central, Harbour Local Rail Network to know which train to jump on to reach your desired destination as early as possible and not get stuck in Mumbai's heavy traffic.Must Visit: Know about all the must visit places in the mesmerizing Mumbai from Gateway of India, Haji Ali, Marine Drive, Juhu Beach, Essel World, Jehangir Art Gallery, Siddhivinayak Temple, Colaba Causeway, Flora Fountain, NGMA, Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus (Victoria Terminus), Chor Bazaar, Bombay High Court, Elephanta Caves, Crawford Market, Hanging Gardens, Mahalakshmi Temple, BandraâWorli Sea Link, Prithvi Theatre, to Film City. Get a list of all these attractions in detail.Nightlife: Mumbai is famous as the city that never sleeps. Thus, it definitely has a lively nightlife to offer. The Skyline of Mumbai is beautifully lit up which is very admirable. With a blend of diverse cultures, religions and cuisine coexisting in the city, it offers vibrant nightlife from fantastic restaurants to discotheques. Get a list of the best pubs such as Wink, Lotus Cafe, The Champagne Lounge, The Eau Bar, The Blue Frog, Hard Rock Cafe, and many more.Hotels: Mumbai has the most top world class and prestigious five-star hotels that have become landmarks themselves. Get a list of all the top-notch hotels in Mumbai and book your stay at the best. The app provides detailed info about hotels' ratings, location details, cuisine served, contact info, etc.Emergency: Get emergency help anywhere anytime in a few clicks about Indian Airlines, Hospitals, Ambulances, Blood Banks, Crime, Railways and Tourist Enquiry from within the application. Lingo Help: Internet is required to use this feature. The default translation is to English language, Note: All information is indicative to help the user best navigate through the Mumbai and is taken from various web sites. No content of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch- Though the Design and presentation of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch Technologies Ltd,. India. For any support queries, please feel free to write to us at mobileproducts@silvertouch.com â Please visit our City Guide Apps website - http://www.silvertouch.mobi/cityguide- For Complete mobile application portfolio can be viewing from this website -- http://www.silvertouch.mobi
